## ProductMediaGalleryEntriesContent interface

ProductMediaGalleryEntriesContent contains an image in base64 format and basic information about the image.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ProductMediaGalleryEntriesContent 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [base64\_encoded\_data?](./magento-api.productmediagalleryentriescontent.base64_encoded_data.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The image in base64 format. |
|  [name?](./magento-api.productmediagalleryentriescontent.name.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The file name of the image. |
|  [type?](./magento-api.productmediagalleryentriescontent.type.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The MIME type of the file, such as image/png. |
